```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)

# Suppress summarise info
options(dplyr.summarise.inform = FALSE)

```

```{r load-libraries}

# Clean the environment and load libraries ############################

rm(list=ls())

source('./scripts/utils/load_all_libraries.R')

```

# Load the data and set flags

(code hidden)

```{r load-transform-tt-data}

reportBF = function(x, digits){
        round(as.numeric(as.vector(x)), digits)
}

plot_dep_var <- 'post_pre_diff'

qc_filter <- T
print(paste0('QC filter? ', qc_filter))


experiment <- c('experiment_1')

print(paste0('Which pilot paradigm? ', experiment))

source('./scripts/utils/load_transform_tt_data.R')
source('./scripts/utils/summary_stats_for_various_factors.R')

# Flags and settings

chose_sparse_color  <- 'blue'
chose_highdim_color <- 'green'
accuracy_color      <- 'yellow'

# Show the basic table
tt_long %>%
        filter(trial_index == 1,session == 1,trial_stage == 'pre_exposure') %>%
        group_by(counterbalancing,
                 prolific_id) %>%
        summarise(n = n()) %>%
        knitr::kable(caption = 'Participants and counterbalancing') %>%
        kable_styling(bootstrap_options = "striped")

```

```{r which-dep-var}

# What to plot on the y axis

plot_dep_var <- 'pre_exposure'


if (plot_dep_var != 'post_pre_diff'){
        y_intercept <- 0.5        
} else {
        y_intercept <- 0
}

```


# Curvature:

```{r curvature, fig.width=12, fig.height=7, warning=F}
x_font_size <- 10

fig3 <- tt_part_sum_stats_curve_type %>%
        # filter(dep_var_type == plot_dep_var) %>% 
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.2,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.3) + 
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.2) +     
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = c(0,0.5), linetype = 'dashed') +   
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        ggtitle(paste0(plot_dep_var,'; chose towards high dimension')) +
        facet_wrap(~dep_var_type, ncol = 1, strip.position = 'right')

fig4 <- tt_part_sum_stats_curve_type %>%
        # filter(dep_var_type == plot_dep_var) %>% 
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.15,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.3) +
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.2) +    
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = c(0,0.5), linetype = 'dashed') +      
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        facet_grid(dep_var_type~counterbalancing)

grid.arrange(fig3,fig4,
             nrow = 1,
             widths = 1:2)

```

# Curvature, easiness, block

```{r curvature-easiness-block, fig.width=10, fig.height=5, warning=F}
x_font_size <- 12

a <- tt_long %>% 
        filter(
                # trial_stage == 'pre_exposure',
               triplet_easiness == 0,
               ) %>%
        droplevels() %>%
        group_by(prolific_id,
                 counterbalancing,
                 curve_type,
                 trial_stage,
                 ) %>%
        summarise(n = n(),
                  mean_chose_towards_highdim = mean(chose_towards_highdim, na.rm = T)) %>%
        ungroup() 

a_by_block <- tt_long %>% 
        filter(
                # trial_stage == 'pre_exposure',
               triplet_easiness == 0,
               ) %>%
        droplevels() %>%
        group_by(prolific_id,
                 counterbalancing,
                 curve_type,
                 trial_stage,
                 session,
                 ) %>%
        summarise(n = n(),
                  mean_chose_towards_highdim = mean(chose_towards_highdim, na.rm = T)) %>%
        ungroup() 

x_font_size <- 12

fig1 <- a %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,
                    alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.2,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.2) + 
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.05) +     
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +   
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        facet_wrap(~trial_stage, ncol = 2, strip.position = 'top') +
        scale_x_discrete(labels=c("Concave", "Middle", "Convex")) +
        xlab('') +
        ylab('p(chose-high-dimension)')
        # geom_text(aes(x=0.5,y=1,label=triplet_easiness)) +
        # ggtitle(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose towards high dimension'))

fig2 <- a_by_block %>%
        filter(trial_stage == 'pre_exposure') %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,
                    alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.2,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.2) + 
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.05) +     
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +   
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        facet_wrap(~trial_stage+session, ncol = 2, strip.position = 'top') +
        scale_x_discrete(labels=c("Concave", "Middle", "Convex")) +
        xlab('') +
        ylab('p(chose-high-dimension)')        
        # geom_text(aes(x=0.5,y=1,label=triplet_easiness)) +
        # ggtitle(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose towards high dimension'))

print(fig1)
print(fig2)

ggsave(filename = 'edge_effects_pre_post.png', plot = fig1, path = './results/plots/', width = 7, height = 3, device='png', dpi=300)
ggsave(filename = 'edge_effects_pre_block_1_2.png', plot = fig2, path = './results/plots/', width = 7, height = 3, device='png', dpi=300)


# grid.arrange(fig1,fig2,
#              widths = 1:1)
```

```{r curvature-template-easiness-session, fig.width=12, fig.height=5, warning=F}

# Calculate the summary stat by session

a <- tt_long %>% 
        filter(trial_stage == 'pre_exposure',
               triplet_easiness == 0) %>%
        droplevels() %>%
        group_by(prolific_id,
                 counterbalancing,
                 session,
                 template_distances,
                 triplet_easiness,
                 curve_type
                 ) %>%
        summarise(n = n(),
                  mean_chose_towards_highdim = mean(chose_towards_highdim, na.rm = T)) %>%
        ungroup() %>%
        reorder_levels(template_distances, order = c('8_-8_-16',
                                                     '16_-16_-32',
                                                     '24_-24_-48'))

x_font_size <- 10

fig3 <- a %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,
                    alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.2,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.3) + 
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.1) +     
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +   
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        facet_wrap(~template_distances, ncol = 1, strip.position = 'right') +
        geom_text(aes(x=0.5,y=1,label=triplet_easiness)) +
        ggtitle(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose towards high dimension'))

fig4 <- a %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=curve_type,
                   y=mean_chose_towards_highdim)) +
        geom_violin(fill = chose_highdim_color,alpha = 0.2) +
        geom_boxplot(width=0.15,
                     outlier.shape = '', fatten = 4) +
        geom_jitter(width = 0.05,
                    height = 0,
                    alpha = 0.3) +
        geom_line(aes(group=prolific_id),
                  alpha = 0.1) +    
        stat_summary(fun = mean,
                     color = 'red') + 
        stat_summary(fun.data = mean_cl_normal,
             geom = "errorbar",
             size=1,
             width=0.1,
             color='red') +          
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +      
        theme(text = element_text(size=x_font_size)) + 
        geom_text(aes(x=0.5,y=1,label=triplet_easiness)) +
        facet_grid(template_distances~session)

grid.arrange(fig3,fig4,
             nrow = 1,
             widths = 1:2)
```

# Plots with x axis sorted by diagnosticity

## Y axis: `r plot_dep_var` chose high-dimension

```{r sorted-plot-chose-high-dimension, fig.width=13, fig.height=15}

# For sorted data
fig1 <- tt_long_post_pre_and_diff %>%
        filter(dep_var_type == plot_dep_var) %>% 
        ggplot(aes(x=reorder(triplet_unique_name,-chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps),
                   y=chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps)) +
        geom_boxplot(fatten = 3, aes(color=curve_type)) + 
        stat_summary(fun=mean,
                     geom = 'point',
                     size = 5,
                     color="black",
                     aes(shape = triplet_easiness)) + 
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
              legend.position = 'top') +
        ylab(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose high-dim')) +
        xlab('Individual Triplets') +
        ggtitle('All counterbalancing groups')



fig2 <- tt_long_post_pre_and_diff %>%
        filter(counterbalancing == 'dense_right',
               dep_var_type == plot_dep_var) %>% 
         ggplot(aes(x=reorder(triplet_unique_name,-chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps),
                   y=chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps)) +
        geom_boxplot(fatten = 4,aes(color=curve_type)) + 
        stat_summary(fun=mean,
                     color='black',
                     aes(shape = triplet_easiness),
                     size = 1) + 
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +
        # geom_point(data = filter(tt_bw_part_sum_stats_triplets,counterbalancing == 'dense_right'),
        #            aes(x = triplet_unique_name,
        #                y = mean_chose_towards_sparse)) +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
              legend.position = 'top') +
        ylab(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose high-dim')) +
        xlab('Individual Triplets') +
        ggtitle('Dense Right')

fig3 <- tt_long_post_pre_and_diff %>%
        filter(counterbalancing == 'dense_left',
               dep_var_type == plot_dep_var) %>%
        ggplot(aes(x=reorder(triplet_unique_name,-chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps),
                   y=chose_towards_highdim_avg_across_reps)) +
        geom_boxplot(fatten = 4,aes(color=curve_type)) +
        stat_summary(fun=mean,
                     color='black',
                     aes(shape = triplet_easiness),
                     size = 1) + 
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
              legend.position = '') +
        ylab(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose high-dim')) +
        xlab('Individual Triplets') +
        ggtitle('Dense Left')

grid.arrange(fig1,fig2,fig3,
             nrow = 3)
```

```{r unsorted-plot-chose-high-dimension-by-pilot-by-cb, fig.width=13, fig.height=25}
        geom_boxplot(fatten = 4,aes(color=curve_type)) +
        stat_summary(fun=mean,
                     color='black',
                     aes(shape = triplet_easiness),
                     size = 1) + 
        geom_hline(yintercept = y_intercept, linetype = 'dashed') +
        theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90),
              legend.position = '') +
        ylab(paste0(plot_dep_var, '; chose high-dim')) +
        xlab('Individual Triplets') +
        ggtitle('Dense Left') +
        geom_vline(xintercept = seq(0.5,27.5,3), 
                   linetype = 'dashed',
                   alpha = 0.5) +
        facet_wrap(~pilot_paradigm, ncol = 1, strip.position = 'right')

grid.arrange(fig1,fig2,fig3,
             nrow = 3)
```
